resources.string: This is CatchPhrase! It is like a game of hot potato and charades! There are two teams. Each team takes turns. At each turn, one person in the team will be holding the device and given a word or phrase on screen. The goal is to get their teammates to guess the given word or phrase without saying it. All the while, a timer will be slowly going off. If it goes off during a team\'s turn, the other team gets a point. If the timer goes off, the other team also has a chance to try to guess what the word / phrase was. If they correctly guess, then they also gain an additional point. This game continues on for a preset amount of rounds and the team with the most points at the end wins!
